programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1963
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep371
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men deem themselves as heroes who can save the earth. While they feel frustrated in real life, a zombie from their favourite animation suddenly appears in Hong Kong, turning people into zombies and causing widespread chaos, the young men decide to take on the responsibility and fight the battle against the zombies!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Earth has always been home to the aliens called Meow since ancient times. This species has now transformed into ordinary cats living among humans all over the world. Xi Xi Li is the last Meow who comes to Earth with the intention of invading it. However, his plan gets derailed when a family in Hong Kong takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley’s mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: The ship of pirate Chang Pao-Chai (Ti Lung) springs a leak after an otherwise successful raid on a foreign ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch his ship up, where he encounters corrupt Qing officials and poor, oppressed peasants. Being a good man at heart, he decides to help out and becomes an even bigger outlaw in the process.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: One of the most far-out, fantastical films ever made in Chinese movie history, this pays tribute to the Japanese superhero trend in the 1970s. It tells the story of the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan, who is transformed from a young lab researcher to a superhero battling the crazy and ambitious monsters of the ice age.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: Love triangles or quadrangles rule, as a group of young people get entangled in a web of love and emotions. Director Doe Chin, renowned for his dramas and musicals, knows just how to tug at the heartstrings.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiao’s home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wife’s faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

programme.title: F3 (Fun And Frustration)
programme.desc: Venky and Varun, who plan on marrying rich wives, fall into the trap of their own making when they realise the brides they are wooing are not rich but greedy for money.
Dr.Vaseegaran is forced to reassemble Chitti in order to stop a deadly winged monster.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: Sethupathi, a tough police officer, investigates the murder of an inspector. His findings lead to the arrest of Vathiyar, an influential man in Madurai, but put his life, career and family at risk.

programme.title: Super Police (2.5 Hrs)
programme.desc: A cop wants to eradicate all the criminals and make the country a better place to live. Although he faces many obstacles in his path of righteousness, he does not give up.

programme.title: Maniyar Kudumbam
programme.desc: Kutti Maniyar, who belongs to a wealthy family, avoids working and lives off his inherited money and property. However, he decides to turn over a new leaf when he falls in love.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: Father Carmen, a priest, joins hands with the police to investigate a series of mysterious suicides. However, he soon stumbles upon a disturbing fact that has serious consequences.

programme.title: Arumugam
programme.desc: Due to his hard work, Arumugam, a helpful poor man, becomes the richest man in his town. He sets out to exact revenge on Malini, a tycoon, for bulldozing his mother's grave and humiliating his sister.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Is a ghost haunting Kiran's ancestral property? Or is it a conman's master moves?

programme.title: Devi 2
programme.desc: Devi starts suspecting her husband, Krishna, of infidelity when she notices him with two other women. However, she unearths a horrifying truth when she decides to investigate.

programme.title: Balle Valleyatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Manjapai
programme.desc: An aged villager comes to the city and sets people right.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Achamindri
programme.desc: Sakthi, a pickpocket, and Sathya, a police officer, must work together to find out who is responsible for a series of deaths and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Poduvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep52
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: Unrelated
programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna who’s dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.

programme.title: Duisburg
programme.desc: Based on the real-life “Ferragosto Massacre”, six young Calabrians are killed by assassins outside of a restaurant. Inspectors Battaglia and Block are tasked to manage the case and they discover a bloodthirsty family feud behind the brutal murders.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Schroeders
programme.desc: With their youngest son Max’s graduation over, Sabine and Bernd find themselves alone with one another. But this new stage of life comes with teething challenges: both have their own dreams and they will have to compromise for one another.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.title: The Winner And I
programme.desc: Carolin is a geriatric nurse and single mother who is stuck with heavy debt. When she finds a 5 million winning lottery ticket, her honest nature prompts her to find its owner. However, things get tricky when the whole town finds out about her “win”.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: Girl On A Bicycle
programme.desc: Paolo, an Italian in Paris, has just proposed to his German girlfriend when he bumps into a pretty French girl. Smitten, Paolo took some bad advice from a friend and finds his life upside-down with a German fiancée, a French "wife" and two Aussie kids.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Winters
programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: My Beautiful Country
programme.desc: Kosovo, 1999. The young Serbian widow Danica gives refuge to an injured Albanian soldier despite knowing that it would endanger her family. A love, one that defies ethnic antagonism and embodies resilience, blossoms between them like a flower in a drought.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: Arcadia
programme.desc: In this searing family drama, a family is traveling across California towards a better life. However, their mother is not with them. Through the eyes of young Greta, the heart-breaking dysfunctionality of the humble suburban family emerges.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For a factory worker named Douglas Quaid, even though he has a beautiful wife who he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life - real memories of life as a super-spy might be just what he needs. But when the procedure goes horribly wrong, Quaid becomes a hunted man. Finding himself on the run from the police - controlled by Chancellor Cohaagen, the leader of the free world - Quaid teams up with a rebel fighter to find the head of the underground resistance and stop Cohaagen. The line between fantasy and reality becomes blurred, and the fate of his world hangs in the balance as Quaid discovers his true identity, his true love, and his true fate.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce--and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: Jim Carry and Jeff Daniels star in this madcap comedy about Harry and Lloyd, two good-natured but incredibly stupid friends who drive across the United States to return a client's briefcase.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Academy Award winner Cate Blanchett star in F. Scott Fitzgerald's story of the life and loves of a man experiencing his life backwards-- The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button. Director David Fincher brings this remarkable tale to the screen. Benjamin Button, is born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I and proceeds to grow younger as time passes. Button, who like any other man is unable to stop time, experiences life and his love for Daisy oddly out of synch with the rest of humanity in this time traveler's tale of the people and places Benjamin Button encounters, the loves he loses and finds, the joys of life and the sadness of death, and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 7
programme.desc: After her latest mission unearths some startling information about Xiao, Nicky and the team devise a plan to deal with her once and for all.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner unearths a long buried secret...

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 8
programme.desc: JD temporarily takes in Fiona and the kids during a time of need. Meanwhile, Garrett changes strategies in his attempt to stop Kamdar.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 14
programme.desc: Michael unveils the ancient mystery behind bowling balls, and later does the world's longest spit-take! Plus, LITERALLY THE BIGGEST special guest in the show's history, a.k.a. Shaquille O'Neal, helps with a plan to blow one superfan's mind!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15
programme.desc: While posing as a cook, Michael warms up his vocal chords to serenade a clam out of its shell, and later, he shocks his sous chef with a fish stick stowaway. Plus, a spirited trick leaves one man questioning the afterlife.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: When Michael opens a shocking package at a shipment warehouse, a man goes hog wild. And while pigs may not fly, Michael proves that kittens can. Plus, one woman believes that a curse has transformed a man right before her eyes.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 4
programme.desc: In order to stop a terrorist group from procuring a deadly chemical weapon, the team must remember key details from their first days at the FBI.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 5
programme.desc: When Jane is shot and Weller kidnapped, the team must fight to save both of their lives while Weller is haunted by some dark ghosts from the past.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 6
programme.desc: When Ice Cream (David Rogers) returns to collect his debt, the team is forced into a life and death race around the world to recover the infamous stolen Gardner paintings.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 7
programme.desc: In an effort to stop Madeline from shipping two planes full of ZIP to the US, the team splits up into a high-stakes undercover mission where they intercept Madeline’s son.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 8
programme.desc: As Madeline and Ivy (Julee Cerda) close in on the location of the bunker, the team realizes that someone on the inside is feeding information to Madeline.

programme.title: Arrow S1 7
programme.desc: Oliver encounters a mysterious woman, Helena Bertinelli (JESSICA DeGOUW), who he can finally be himself with, but soon comes to realize she's hiding dangerous secrets of her own.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S1 3
programme.desc: Blair uncovers scandalous information about Serena that may not remain a secret much longer.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 9
programme.desc: With the surviving members of the team in FBI custody, Madeline and Ivy are in the final stages of their plan, but a few unlikely allies come out from the woodwork.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 15
programme.desc: While Alex faces the biggest challenge of her life, Supergirl continues to fight Nyxly, but after she kidnaps William, Supergirl realizes she needs to be more proactive.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 21
programme.desc: Determined to expose the person who drugged and assaulted her at a party the year before, Veronica questions her friends and many rivals about the events that occurred that night at Shelly Pomeroy's (MELISSA HOOVER) house. Meanwhile, when one of Veronica and Wallace's stunts affects Alicia's (recurring guest star ERICA GIMPEL) job at Kane Software, she confronts Keith about his daughter's behavior. Later, in an attempt to get closer to his son, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hostsa birthday party for Logan that surprises everyone.

programme.title: Arrow S1 7
programme.desc: Oliver encounters a mysterious woman, Helena Bertinelli (JESSICA DeGOUW), who he can finally be himself with, but soon comes to realize she's hiding dangerous secrets of her own.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 19
programme.desc: Michael refreshes stale nachos, peels back the truth behind a fake bill and unveils the latest in cellular soda machine technology. But what will happen when he breathes new life into a T-Rex?

programme.desc: Sumner's Return - Diane goes on a dinner date with her ex and his wife.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep17
programme.desc: Hyde School Reunion - Phoebe accidentally casts a spell on herself that allows her wild teenage personality to take over, and teen Phoebe is eager to use her magic to her advantage.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Moffett's Ghost - On a secret mission behind the Iron Curtain, Hawke loses control of the onboard computer, which was programmed by Airwolf's creator, Dr. Moffett…now Airwolf is set to destroy any aircraft in its range.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Truth About Holly - Hawke and Dominic must protect Dominic's niece from a dangerous drug kingpin and find a new employee for Santini Air.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hunted - A mysterious industralist sends a group of brisk, dignified, and apparently super-efficient business people to make Dominic Santini an offer he can't refuse to use Santini Air, its personnel, equipment, and facilities for whatever exhorbitant price he comes to name.

programme.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel Ep02
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Dancing Bear - Endora and Darrin's mother both give Tabitha the same teddy bear. Endora places a spell on her bear, which dances every time anyone says the name Tabitha.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Double Tate - Endora gives Darrin three wishes for his birthday, without telling him. Darrin wishes he were Larry for a day and he turns into a double of his boss.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Samantha , The Dressmaker - Samantha is trying to design and sew an evening gown for a business dinner. Samantha and Endora sneak a peek at some yet to be unveiled fashions in Paris.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep23
programme.desc: The Horse's Mouth - Samantha turns a runaway racehorse into an attractive woman to find out why she escaped. In her human form, the horse tells Samantha that her name is Dally Ran.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Baby's First Paragraph - Tired of hearing how smart Gladys' baby nephew is, Endora uses witchcraft to make Tabitha talk fluently. The speech makes its way into the national news.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Doogie the Red Nosed Reindeer - It is Christmas Eve. The exhausted medical staff are working overtime in the E.R., where Paul, a nicely dressed but shoeless man, is brought in. He is in a confused state and thinks he is Darth Vader.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Greed is Good - At the persuasion of Vinnie, Doogie participates as a contestant on “High IQ”, a game show for geniuses. At the hospital, Joe E. Dunn is admitted, complaining of decreased vision.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Attack of the Green-Eyed Monster - Wanda becomes jealous when Doogie runs into—and is recognized by—Krista, a beautiful blonde whose shapely leg he had operated on. She invites him to a sorority party at UCLA as Wanda storms off.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep16
programme.desc: It Ain't Over 'til Mrs. Howser Sings - While cleaning out the Howser garage, Doogie and Vinnie find some old home movies and screen them. One of them shows Mrs. Howser dressed as a 1960’s hippy singing with a rock band.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Tough Guys Don't Teach - The hospital sends Doogie to high school to teach safe sex practices as the Board of Education feels it would be beneficial for students to learn about such matters from a peer.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Dream Boat/ Best Of Friends/ Aftermath - Merrill gets a lucrative job offer on a super liner. Doc's former mentor Art is now a bitter amputee traveling with his guilt-ridden wife Laura. College friends Carol and Gwen both fall for passenger Paul Dunbar.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep12
programme.desc: Depressing News - Klinger decides to give 'The Stars and Stripes' some competition and start a newspaper of his own. He sweet-talks everyone he sees into subscribing and even enlists Hot Lips into writing a beauty column. Even more surprising is Charles Winchester agreeing to write a column on gourmet cooking. In other news, Hawkeye gets a creative bug: when 500,000 tongue depressors are delivered to the unit instead of the requested 5,000 Hawkeye decides to build a monument to the unit out of the surplus.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep13
programme.desc: No Laughing Matter - Hawkeye bets B.J. he can go an entire day without cracking a joke in order to disprove the suggestion from a Reader’s Digest article, which says that incessant joking stems from chronic insecurity. Charles, on the other hand, is more concerned with the news of a visitor from his past coming to the 4077th. Colonel Baldwin is the man who sent Charles to the Korean front when the Colonel’s cribbage debt to Winchester became outrageously high. The unit watches Charles prepare to meet his tormentor.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep14
programme.desc: Oh, How We Danced - While the rest of the 4077th plans a surprise for a homesick B.J. for his wedding anniversary, Charles is sent to the front lines to make an inspection of the medical facilities. The unit conspires to make a tape of B.J. reminiscing about his life back in San Francisco and what he would have done for his anniversary if he were home. They send the tape home to B.J.’s wife, Peg, who makes a film and tape out of it and sends it back to the unit. Meanwhile, Charles learns Karate from an elderly Korean gentleman in order to feel more secure when visiting the front. Later Hawkeye and Klinger give B.J. a surprise party and show him the film while B.J. dances with Margaret, who stands in for his beloved Peg.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep15
programme.desc: Bottoms Up - A practical joke on Charles backfires on Hawkeye. Charles becomes the unit hero while Hawkeye is booed at in the mess tent and glared at by the general populace. Hawkeye tries a scheme in which he will appear the victim, which also misfires. He then tries to rectify the situation with another joke which also fails miserably, as does the next and the next. Hot Lips has no time for joking when she discovers one of her nurses has a drinking problem.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Aurora - The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. The arctic wilderness of Northern Sweden is one of the best places to witness the aurora. Discover how it is created, by witnessing the beauty of total eclipses, a mass turtle migration in Costa Rica and powerful tidal whirlpools off the west coast of Scotland.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Colourful Planet - From space Earth is a kaleidoscope. Turquoise plankton blooms trigger a feeding frenzy, China turns yellow with rapeseed flowers, and mysterious green lights appear in the ocean.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: Big Cats: The Science of
programme.desc: Scientists are constantly making discoveries that reveal new insight into big cat behaviour and physiology. This programme explores big cats ranging from cheetahs to Andean mountain cats.

programme.title: The Supervet S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Trigger, Fury and Raven - Police dog Trigger has crushed sciatic nerves, feisty kitten Fury has a suspected tibia injury, and will shepherd doodle Raven get a new hip?

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep1

programme.title: Inside the Factory S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Croissants - Gregg Wallace is in France at an enormous croissant factory where they produce 336,000 of the flaky pastries every day. He follows the production of croissants from the arrival of 21 tonnes of butter right through to dispatch.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the last episode, Samira Ahmed travels to the crumbling ruins of an ancient walled city and goes back to when Persia faced her gravest threat: Genghis Khan.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S9 Ep5
programme.desc: Shetlands - Ben journeys to one of Britain's furthest outposts - the Shetland Islands to meet Helen and Jason, a couple on the edge of the weather-beaten island of Yell.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Mauritius - In this episode Robson heads to Mauritius - a country famous for honeymooning couples - but he's going to fish.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, it’s just another day at the butcher’s counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 - March of the Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Masters of Defence Ep5
programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Water Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Mexico Ep3
programme.desc: The mythology of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, “Ixchel,” who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3
programme.desc: For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animal’s legacy. But it’s not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwa’s mating game.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - The Hungry Leopard Ep1
programme.desc: A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Water Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Mexico Ep3
programme.desc: The mythology of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, “Ixchel,” who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 - Hawaii Ep4
programme.desc: Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Outcasts Ep1
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here – the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He’s not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Simien Mountains Ep3
programme.desc: Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Southern Drylands Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep31
programme.desc: Swords Man - Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep32
programme.desc: A Grim Retreat - The Riders head to a tropical island for fun in the sun, not realizing it's infested with Grimora Leeches which drives their dragons to turn on them.

programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep32
programme.desc: Turboldy Go Part 1/Part 2 - A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space; The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris ... and a fiery re-entry.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep57
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lord Shark - King Julien's submarine sinks in the ocean; Clover & Sage go on quests to test their patience and rage; Mort leads an escape but a spy is in the midst

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep58
programme.desc: Bad Year Blimp - King Julien and his team ride sharks to an Island; Clover and Sage get a map that leads to the wisdom they seek; Mort hides in Junk Harbor

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much/Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost/Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes/Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math/Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep30
programme.desc: The Muscle - When traveling to recruit the mighty Golem for their mission, Puss tries to prove that no one is better than him at being "the muscle" of the team.

programme.desc: Fauxsa Unchained - King Julien and Maurice infiltrate a Foosa gladiator school; Sage and Clover must face their enemies; Mort decides he must form his own army
