programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cheeky Sneeze - When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rupert And The Special Sandcastle - Despite Miranda's warnings a sandcastle competition in Rocky Bay is in danger from the incoming tide

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy'S Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly'S Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Pie Spy - Pieface steals Professor Von Screwtop’s Pastry-based, Intelligent, Espionage unit (P-I-E). After forming a strong bond with the pie-shaped robot - Pieface is dismayed when Walter steals it from him to protect his Dad from the embarrassing footage the PIE’s memory chip holds.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Veg - Night of the Living Veg Mrs Creecher uses the school’s allotment to hold Class 3C’s ‘Biggest Veg’ competition. Determined to outshine Walter Dennis will do anything to grow the biggest veg. Little did he know that JJ’s Gran’s special elixir mixed with Walter’s Dad’s V-V plant food, will transform their plants into giant living, walking, groaning veggies. They turn to Paul the Potato to help them 'smoothie' out the situation!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep56
programme.desc: The Feud! - The Paladins end up on the set of a game show called "Garfle Warfle Snick," and although they don't know how they got there or how to play the game, they must win in order to escape

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep4
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Four - Director Peachfuzz recruits Rocky and Bullwinkle to help her infiltrate Fearless Leader’s hideout, and Boris and Natasha are replaced by a robot henchman

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Compst Elf / Meet Ya At The Stump - The streets get trashy when Archibald misinforms folks about compost. Archibald and his pals rally when their favorite hangout is threatened.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse Of The Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math/Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep40
programme.desc: Friend Like Tip / Like Mother, Like Pit Of Fire - Tip meets a surprisingly similar girl which threatens Tip's uniqueness/ When Tip and Die-Anne refuse to "be like their moms", they end up finding themselves in a dangerous situation

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girl’s plans to attend the Governor’s Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair… lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist – but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What'S Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Rupert’S Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep318
programme.desc: The Running of the Bullfrogs! - Ribbit! Gil and Goby bring a tadpole named Fernando to school to watch him grow into a frog. When Fernando's ready to hop, Gil and Goby will have to lead him back to his pond in the traditional Running of the Bullfrogs!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Fright Bite / The Loudly Bones - When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires. // Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep104
programme.desc: Not Normal / Gone - When Squidward points out to SpongeBob that he's not normal, SpongeBob makes it his mission to become normal. // SpongeBob wakes up one morning to find that everyone in Bikini Bottom is gone - even Gary!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep105
programme.desc: The Splinter / Slide Whistle Stooges - While working at the Krusty Krab, SpongeBob accidentally gets a splinter. // SpongeBob and Patrick are having fun with their new slide whistles, and, of course, it's driving Squidward crazy.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep194
programme.desc: Patrick! The Game - Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep104
programme.desc: OctoCharlotte / Trouble In Tropikini - Schwoz accidentally morphs Charlotte into half girl/half octopus, Captain Man & Kid Danger work to change her back but must catch her first! // The group's vacation is cut short when Jasper falls into a volcano & is held captive by the Volcaniacs.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Wait / A Mutt Above - Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. // Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep410
programme.desc: A Grave Mistake / Leader of the Rack - Lucy faces off against her friend Haiku to become the new president of the Young Morticians' Club at school. // Leni is promoted to temporary manager at work, but she worries about remaining good friends with Miguel and Fiona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep165
programme.desc: House Sittin' for Sandy / Smoothe Jazz at Bikini Bottom - All is quiet while SpongeBob is house-sitting for Sandy... until Patrick shows up! // SpongeBob and Squidward lose their passes and try desperately to sneak backstage at the sold-out Kelpy G show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep90
programme.desc: Donut Of Shame - When Patrick accidentally takes SpongeBob's donut he is wracked with guilt over his crime.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Box Smusher / Tie-Dye Eye - When multiple packages are found smushed, the Middlemost Post must discover the truth and clear their name. // Parker wakes up one morning with Tie-Dye Eye, and pretty soon, so does the entire mountain.

Unfortunately, despite Roger’s warnings, she opens it up. And an atomic shock wave wafts out of the alarm clock and surrounds the entire island, provoking a very bizarre temporal malfunction for each of the island’s inhabitants. Each animal is prisoner of a time warp and repeats over and over the same action. The unexpected consequence of Fatou’s screw-up is that the entire island is now threatened with sinking into the ocean! Fatou and Roger just barely manage to repair the alarm clock in time and save the island. Whew...that was close!

programme.desc: #22 Let's take a photo. / Encourage someone to do something with you by replacing "masu" at the end of a verb with "mashoo." "Torimasu" becomes "torimashoo."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Indonesian reporter Aji Rokhadi retraces the stories of Southeast Asian Hiroshima bombing victims. He meets a Malaysian scholar who does research on them and a Japanese man who honors their memory.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: (1) Atsu-age (2) Simmered Atsu-age. Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes!

programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Tracing Rice in Japan.
